title: MeadowView Conference Resort & Convention Center Entices Tr
text:
KINGSPORT, Tenn. , Aug. 27, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --  MeadowView Conference Resort & Convention Center invites guests to end summer with a weekend they'll always remember. From romantic getaways to fun with friends, travelers will find the perfect Kingsport hotel package to get the good times rolling while enjoying the great outdoors. 
As one of the premier golf resorts in Tennessee , MeadowView Conference Resort & Convention Center is offering the Ultimate Golf Package , featuring deluxe accommodations with the choice of a king or two double beds, as well as 18 holes for two people and a cart at the on-site Cattails Golf Club. Whether an avid golfer or simply looking to work on a swing while surrounded by scenic views, this package is one that guests won't want to miss out on, available seven days a week through Dec. 31, 2015 , with rates from just $124 to $199 a night. 
Complete with Bermuda fairways, greenside mounds and six sets of tee complexes, Cattails Golf Course provides a memorable game for golfers of all skill levels. Take in the spectacular views of the fall foliage, six beautiful lakes, wide fairways and large, rewarding putting greens. Guests wishing to upgrade their bag with the latest golf gear can head to Cattails Golf Course & Club Shop, featuring everything from top-name gloves and hats to bags and ball markers. 
Golf lovers aren't the only ones scoring big. Whether a wine connoisseur or simply a casual drinker, guests can experience sips worth savoring when they indulge in the Wine Weekend Getaway Package . Featuring deluxe accommodations for two, breakfast for two in Meadows Restaurant, a Cattails Golf towel and wine tasting for two at Fieldstone Cellar, this special deal is a generous pour for wine lovers of all tastes. The Wine Weekend Getaway Package has rates starting from just $134 a night, is valid Thursday through Sunday and available through Dec. 31, 2015 . 
Encircled by mountains, Fieldstone Cellar invites guests to explore the largest vineyard in Tennessee . Discover the scenic beauty while sipping, swirling and savoring vistas and vintages many years in the making. 
For additional ways to stay active and entertained, guests will enjoy easy access to a variety of attractions for all ages and interests including Kingsport Aquatic Center, Bays Mountain Park & Planetarium and Symphony in the Mountains. MeadowView Conference Resort & Convention Center is also approximately 20 miles from Bristol Motor Speedway, and 70 miles from Asheville, NC , and Gatlinburg, TN. 
When it's time to unwind, tired travelers will find the Tennessee golf resort's spacious accommodations the perfect place to rediscover relaxation. With private balconies in every room, guests can wrap up a brilliant day taking in breathtaking views of the Blue Ridge Mountains and the beautiful fall foliage the city is known for. Inside, travelers can catch up on some work using the spacious desk and Wi-Fi access, or kick back in front of the flat-panel TV while cooling a bottle of wine from the vineyard in the mini refrigerator. Luxurious bedding and piles of fluffy pillows will tempt travelers when it's time to call it a night.
To take advantage of the Ultimate Golf Package, use promotional code ZJ4 when booking online or by calling 1-423-578-6633. For the Wine Weekend Getaway, use promotional code WN9 online or by calling 1-800-834-7015. 
About MeadowView Conference Resort & Convention Center
MeadowView Conference Resort & Convention Center at 1901 Meadowview Parkway in Kingsport, TN is near Kingsport Aquatic Center, Bays Mountain Park & Planetarium and Symphony in the Mountains. The hotel features 7 floors with 304 rooms, 1 suite, 49 meeting rooms with 88,000 square feet of total event space, 3 restaurants, a fitness center, indoor pool and whirlpool. For information, visit www.marriott.com/TRICC or call 1-423-578-6600. Like MeadowView Conference Resort & Convention Center on Facebook and add the hotel to a circle on Google Plus .
